cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c3 =(CaraGen ` c2)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c2)
⊣ c1 = ⋃ dom(c2)

comment: An element of the Caratheodory's construction is a subset of the base set of the outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
